page.title: 09Garden Fete in Gringley Cont
page.content: Darts (Mr J.Hargreaves);bowling (Mr E. Stevens);{croquet}(Mr R.Wood & Mr R. Morley).Madame Zara's palmistry booth proved particularly popular.The garden fete raised Â£390 for church funds.{ { {-------------------------------------- {Sticky golf}is a game.There is a board covered with cloth.It is put at a slant.Players use a club to hit a golf ball covered with 'Velcro' at a target score board.{Catch the Rat}is a game. There is a piece of tubing which is put at a slant.A block of wood (the rat) is slid down and you have to hit it with a wooden bat as it comes out at the bottom.{Croquet}is a game played in a garden.The aim of the game is to knock a ball through a number of hoops in as few strokes as possible. {white elephant}stall:sells unwanted items donated by parishioners.
